input_text:
Job Title: SAP FICO Consultant

Location: San Diego County, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Customer Service, Finance

Description:
Who are we?At Scalian, we are a leading multinational engineering consulting firm with 5,500 specialists and over 30 years of experience. We are specialized in Digital Systems (IT & Software and Systems Engineering) and Industrial Performance (Quality Assurance, Supply Chain, and Project Management).Our expertise serves various technological sectors such as the aerospace, defense, rail, and energy industries while providing distinctive support to their development and operations.
Are you an experienced SAP FICO Consultant?If your answer is yes, it’s your lucky day as we are looking for a dynamic and talented person to join our team in the US!
What will your role be?Scalian is looking for an SAP FICO Consultant, you will analyze clients' business requirements, develop strategic roadmaps, and lead the implementation of SAP Finance solutions, including P2P (Procure to Pay) and O2C (Order to Cash) modules. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure successful project delivery, provide ongoing support to optimize clients' ERP systems, and manage ticketing system operations for level 1-3 support.
Activities: business process analyses and preliminary cost versus benefit measurements.and map clients’ business requirements, processes, and objectives, developing necessary product modificationsmodule scope and develop strategic roadmaps for enterprise business solution portfoliosall design, configuration, and specification documentation and assist customers in resolving post-go-live issuesworkshops to demonstrate module functionality and influence transition states toward joint business outcomescollaborative architecture discussions with customers, IT, and business executives.industry/corporate process implementation across all related applications, including P2P and O2Cdevelopers and customers in integration and acceptance testingparticipate in the preparation, realization, and Go Live of customer implementation projectsticketing system operations for level 1-3 support, ensuring timely resolution of issues
What skills and qualifications are we looking for?success in contributing to a team-oriented environment with excellent interpersonal skillsexperience with S4 HANA Simple Finance migrations or implementationsto work creatively and analytically in a problem-solving environmentoral, written, and communication skillsyears of general business/manufacturing industry experiencewith SAP S/4HANA and knowledge of asset accounting are advantageousof 7 years SAP consulting experience with at least 5 years in Finance and at least 2 end-to-end implementationsplanning and time management skills with a customer service-focused attituderole in data gathering for implementation and troubleshooting software defects as a customer liaison
Why join us?To acquire experience in different critical industries and projects while working for the same company;To have a competitive salary and a great benefits packageTo access trainings that focus on expanding your knowledge while staying up to date with cutting edge technologies and best practices;To have a clear career development plan that suits your goals;To have the possibility of working abroad through our mobility program thanks to our international presence;To join a dynamic, specialized and fast-growing group where communication is key and where every team member is valuedTo be part of a team where having fun is essential

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: SAP FICO Consultant
output_json.summary: A leading multinational engineering consulting firm seeks an experienced SAP FICO Consultant for a full-time position in San Diego County, CA.
job_responsibilities: Lead the implementation of SAP Finance solutions
Provide ongoing support to optimize clients' ERP systems
Manage ticketing system operations for level 1-3 support
output_json.company_information: Scalian is a leading multinational engineering consulting firm with 5,500 specialists and over 30 years of experience in Digital Systems and Industrial Performance.
